Who: RODIMUS PRIME, SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, Kup, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways

> Kup Embrace himself and waited for the result of the Tucson's actions.
> Darkhawk screamed iwht pain and his body started to lauch sparks, he looked
> with hate Tucson and the maximals. Nightlight moaned with pain.
>
> Hydras and Perceptor Screamed in pain.

Rodimus Prime looked over at Tuscon and then at the others as the wave
of sensation swept over him. He could see the jerks of pain from
Scorponok and Darkhawk as they fell down in pain, while the Autobots
and Maximals seemed to be struggling to hold back the laughter, and
then he felt it too. it was a wave of warmth that seemed to vibrate at
his relays, causing him to jerk slightly as he smiled and held himself
silent.

However something was different with Scourge. He felt the wave pass
over him, and like a wave of pain he staggered back a step, but it was
not enough to bring him to his knees.

Scorponok glanced at Scourge with pain filled optics, "Why aren't you in pain?"

Scourge glanced at him and then back at the Autobots, "Because I am
not built as a Decepticon but Unicronian, we are superior."

Scourge tapped his radio as he held up his weapon defensively,
realizing that at the moment it was only he against the Autobots as
his 'back up' was on the ground. "Sir!" Scourge sent to Hydras and
Cyclonus, "Tuscon is doing that wave thing again."

******************************************************
Who: CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, NIGHTRAZOR, Hydras, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways

Not far away, Cyclonus got the call and looked down as Hydras and
Perceptor were also down in pain, "We are having the same effect
here." Cyclonus said, as he like the other Unicronian based
transformers could feel the wave, but its affects were far less
pronounced and a lot easier to ignore.

Phobia looked at Hydras as she spoke to the others, "I thought Hydras
was Galvatron also? His Unicronian design should protect him like us?"
she looked confused and almost genuinely concerned.

Cyclonus nodded, "He is, but I believe that in taking on the Megatron
Spark and his more . . . um . . . terrestrial form, that he has become
more Decepticon than we."

Cyclonus gestured at Nightrazor, "Use your noise cancellation field to
negate this until we can figure out a better solution."

Nightrazor nodded as he began to cancel out the effects of the sonar.
As sonar is basically an operation of sound, Nightrazor begins
generating a type of white noise to directly cancel out its affects.
This is typically used to keep his movements quiet or to catch a foe
at unawares, however this application of it was easily within his
capabilities.

Cyclonus nodded as he gestured to the others, "Nightrazor, stay with
Perceptor and Hydras, it may take them a few moments to recover, and
they may need your field until this ends."

Nightrazor nodded as he stood close to Hydras and Perceptor, tying to
keep the field up.

Cyclonus straightened, "Computer!" he said as he looked around.

"Working." said the cool computer voice.

"Open fire on all Maximal and Autobot energy signatures."

"Acknowledged." the computer voice came back, as internal gun units
once again oriented on the Maximal and Autobot group and opened up
again on Tuscon and his group!

"Come!" Cyclonus said to Phobia and Deepstryke, "It is time to end
this. Hydras will join us when he recovers."

Cyclonus, Deepstryke and Phobia jogged down the hall towards the
Autobots and Maximals leaving Hydras and Perceptor to recover under
the protection of Nightrazor's field.

(TAG)

Preston
